channel.title: Ive Found a Trade Dupe Need Help Fixing
channel.description:
Okay So the Dupe is a Trade dupe when in second trade interface the person giving items accepts then clicks minimap the second waits to accept as the first logs out. When Player one log on he has the item and so does player 2
Please Help!!

item.title: Ive Found a Trade Dupe Need Help Fixing
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Make sure you’re declining/closing all trade windows on player disconnection… public void destruct I think it is.

Read full topic
item.source: Ive Found a Trade Dupe Need Help Fixing
